ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] --NO-SSL option removed from heritrix 3?
ygData.msgSnippet: I think you re right. Sorry. I d be amenable to a pull request adding that option (or not doing https when listening only on localhost, which was the behavior

=
option (or not doing https when listening only on localhost, which was the

behavior at one point).
